articles.author: Melanie Mason
articles.title: Kamala Harris delivers reality check to bullish Democrats - Politico
articles.description: The former vice president warned her party that “for so many, the American dream has become more of a myth than reality.”

articles.author: John Towfighi
articles.title: Trump gives Elon Musk a win over a longtime foe - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday ordered a review of two major proxy advisory firms — companies that advise shareholders on votes — that had previously drawn the ire of Tesla CEO Elon Musk and others in Corporate America.
